short_description: woodstock parts is a metal fabrication services company based in leicester, united kingdom.
long_description: assured lowest prices with quality to match your local supplier. we are a team of passionate engineers based in the uk & india. we specialise in reverse engineering, creating products in metal, plastic, nylon or rubber. supplying with pride to uk, european and global companies since 1996. woodstock guarantees a high quality finished product, as per your requirements, using any of the above manufacturing processes.we produce parts from any ferrous and non-ferrous material, such as metal, rubber, plastic, nylon, poly urethene etc. the woodstock group has over 22+ years of experience in the development and manufacturing of all types of engineering components in india. we help our customers to lower costs, increase efficiency and drive innovation by becoming their back end procurement office. woodstock provide comprehensive manufacturing with our own operations based in strategic hot-spots. we have a manufacturing network in india, thailand, malaysia, vietnam, sri lanka as well as our uk based customer support and technical services.

generated_description: woodstock parts, legally known as woodstock parts uk ltd., based in leicester, england, specializes in the development and manufacturing of a wide range of mechanical components. the company offers products such as castings, forgings, sheet metal, fabrication, extrusion, moulding, and turned parts. woodstock parts uk ltd. caters to high-mix, low-volume requirements and provides services including product development, manufacturing, supply and logistics, pre-shipment inspection, and metallic failure analysis. the company serves various industries, including automotive, aerospace, medical, and industrial machinery, and ensures high-quality standards through stringent manufacturing processes and rigorous inspection methods.
